item.description:
Let's learn from each other about what we're finding as best practices for using social networking in a business sense. You should attend whether or not you're already using social media for networking.

We'll talk about it for our own business uses and how to handle our clients' questions about it.

In the true sense of social networking, this is a peer-to-peer discussion. There will be a facilitator to keep things focused and within the schedule.

You'll be able to ask questions of each other, plus the facilitator will bring questions to get us going, such as:

1) What's one specific thing you've found useful on LinkedIn in the last month?
2) What's one specific thing you've found useful on Twitter in the last month?
3) Who has a Facebook Page for their business and why?
4) Have you used social bookmarking (e.g., Delicious) for social networking?
5) Who blogs and why?
6) How much time are you putting into social media networking?
7) Tell us your favorite tip to make it all more manageable.


Facilitator: Val Nelson - specialties: web optimization, social media strategy consultant, blogger-for-hire

6:30 pm - networking
7:00 - 8:30 pm - discussion

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: How We're Using Social Media Networking
